Articles.Content: How to purchase kerbal space program,? i know it is in FAQ, but i am in india, Tamilnadu. i don't know about payment options.. it shows 30 $ , but what is the price in indian rupees. any one help! ;.;

According to Google, $30 USD is currently about 1900.35 indian rupees. To my memory, the only payment options currently offered are PayPal and PaySafeCard.

If you have access to Steam, you can also purchase KSP through there with a credit card directly. (And I think that since it's close to Christmas, KSP will probably be cheaper on Steam at the moment, as are a lot of Steam games this time of year.)

you can also purchase KSP through there with a credit card directly.

Also note that PayPal doesn't require a PayPal account, and will accept all common credit and debit cards. It's my usual option when paying online via a Maestro debit card that many online retailers don't understand (and yet they accept transactions from PayPal, which does).
